attributes.action: Have Boris Johnson resign as a result of the Sue Gray report
attributes.additional_details: Public confidence in Parliament and the Prime Minister are at a low, he has been shown to have broken the rules, or known about rule breaking in his own party, not only this, but he has been fined by the met police for breaking his country's law, which is entirely unacceptable.
attributes.background: Boris Johnson, the Prime Minister, has been found to have broken the law, and be in attendance of parties within his place of residence as a result of the Sue Gray report. As such, he should be made to resign as he misled parliament on numerous occasions

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. This includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.

You might like to sign the following petitions, which call for related actions:

Require MPs who break the law be removed from office
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614705

An MP found guilty of breaking any law is automatically subject to recall
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614888
